thread.title: McDonald's trialling table service in UK
thread.title_full: McDonald's trialling table service in UK

title: McDonald's trialling table service in UK
text:
View Photo 

McDonald's will offer table service for the first time in the UK as it seeks to ward off competition from upmarket burger chains. 
Diners can place their order with a staff member carrying a tablet computer or direct through a digital kiosk at the table. 
There will still be an option to order at the till. 
The fast food giant is trialling the service at its branch in Mottram, Greater Manchester, and will extend it to 11 more across the UK this month. 
If it proves successful, the trial will be rolled out across the country. 
McDonald's move is seen as a response to increased competition from upmarket rivals such as GBK and Byron's. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook McDonald's trialling table service in UK AAP
